ygData.subject: Re: LFG, Anyone willing is welcome.
ygData.msgSnippet: It seems there may just be enough people to for a small group. Is the newbie server Stromm OK with everyone.  Anyone who wants to join role a newbie toon on
ygData.messageBody:
It seems there may just be enough people to for a small group.
Is the newbie server Stromm OK with everyone. Anyone who wants to
join role a newbie toon on Stromm Thursday at 6 pm eastern standard
time loggin, then join channel hoggtyed that way we can see who is on
and where at we can go from there. So far we have a Human monk. We
will try and shoot for a well balanced group so depending on turnout
we may have to adjust characters.
Main thing is we have fun. If any of you cant make it but intend
to try and come in the future shoot me an email at hoggtyed@...
Looking forward to see what happens til then safe journeys to all.
Hogg
